description.brief: driver for the GPS boards using the PASH protocol

package.description: This is a driver for GPS boards that use the PASH protocol. In particular, it is used to drive a Magellan MB500 board, and includes functionality for dGPS setups (correction sending through network, RTK-specific options).
package.author: Sylvain Joyeux/sylvain.joyeux@dfki.de
